anya-e0905n1:2_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:5_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante seyyasakaṁ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:7_1: āyasmā bhante seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi,
anya-e0905n1:8_0: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:9_0: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n1:11_0: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi saṅghādisesoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:13_0: Vissajjanā – aññatra supinantāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:15_1: sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatrasupinantā saṅghādisoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:16_0: Pucchā – sādhāraṇa paññattinukho āvuso asādhāraṇa paññattinukho.
anya-e0905n1:18_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n1:19_1: upakkamitvā bhante asuciṁ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n1:20_0: Saṅghādisesassa , ceteti upakkamati na muccati āpatti thullaccayassa, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
anya-e0905n1:22_1: channaṁ bhante anāpatti supinantena mocentassa na mocanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa
anya-e0905n1:22_2: ādikammikassa imesaṁ kho bhante channaṁ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n1:23_0: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katamena uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n1:24_0: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṁ bhante pātimokkhuddesānaṁ tatiyena uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n1:25_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n1:32_1: na eva rūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n1:33_0: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:34_1: dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto saṅghasuṭṭhutāya…pe…
anya-e0905n1:38_0: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n1:40_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n1:43_1: atthi nukho āvuso tattha sanidāne sapadabhājanīye savinītavatthuke upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n1:45_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ paṭhamassa saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadassa nidānampi pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n1:45_8: puṭṭho puṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n1:45_9: itihidaṁ bhante paṭhama saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṁ saparivāraṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n1:45_10: Tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n1:45_11: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n1:45_12: evameva mayampi sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā idaṁ paṭhamaṁ saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n1:45_13: nidānato paṭṭhāya ekaccānaṁ vacasā sajjhāyavasena ekaccānaṁ manasā manasikaraṇavasenaca ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ
anya-e0905n1:46_2: sammāsambuddhena mātukāmena saddhiṁ kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjantassa ca,
anya-e0905n1:46_4: mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsantassa ca,
anya-e0905n1:46_5: sañcarittaṁ samāpajjantassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:49_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante udāyittheraṁ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:51_1: āyasmā bhante udāyitthero mātugāmena saddhiṁ kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n1:51_2: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi,
anya-e0905n1:51_3: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ abhāsi,
anya-e0905n1:53_2: sammāsambuddhena saññācikāya kuṭiṁ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:56_0: Vissajjanā – āḷavike bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:58_0: Vissajjanā – āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:60_2: sammāsambuddhena mahallakaṁ vihāraṁ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:63_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante channattheraṁ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:65_1: āyasmā bhante channo vihāravatthuṁ sodhento aññataraṁ cetiyarukkhaṁ chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṁ nigamapūjitaṁ nagara pūjitaṁ janapadapūjitaṁ raṭṭhapūjitaṁ,
anya-e0905n1:67_2: sammāsambuddhena bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsentassa ca,
anya-e0905n1:67_3: bhikkhuṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsentassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:69_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:70_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ,
anya-e0905n1:70_3: teyeva bhante mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṁ
anya-e0905n1:72_2: sammāsambuddhena saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:74_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattho.
anya-e0905n1:76_0: Devadatto bhante samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:78_2: sammāsambuddhena bhedānuvattakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantānaṁ saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:80_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:81_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū devadattassa saṅghābhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṁ vaggavādakā,
anya-e0905n1:83_2: sammāsambuddhena dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:85_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:86_2: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n1:88_2: sammāsambuddhena kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:90_0: Pucchā – kaṁ ārabbha āvuso kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:91_1: assaji punabbasuke bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n1:91_2: assajipunabbasukā bhante bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n1:93_2: sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo ca aniyato dutiyo ca aniyato kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:95_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:96_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṁ ekoekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṁkammaniye nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n1:96_4: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho nisajjaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n1:98_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n1:101_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n1:104_1: ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ paṭhama duṭṭhadosa sikkhāpadato
anya-e0905n1:104_3: so ca āyasmā puṭṭho puṭṭho vissajjeti,
anya-e0905n1:104_4: itihidaṁ bhante sabbaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n1:104_5: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n1:104_6: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n1:104_7: evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
